rules_text:
Destroy target creature you don't control. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Overload {2}{U}{B}{B}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change “target” in its text to “each.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The elder council of New Tensuo were far too slow to realize the danger Chance-in-Hell posed, and by the time they acted, she was already done with them.[/i]
